doc_request.user_query: Provide a list of parameters and their corresponding values for floating slab foundation systems, including design specifications, reinforcement details, and construction methods, to help fill out an Excel sheet.

state_context.user_query: Provide a list of parameters and their corresponding values for floating slab foundation systems, including design specifications, reinforcement details, and construction methods, to help fill out an Excel sheet.

conversation_history.question: find me floating slab projects
conversation_history.answer:
Based on the provided context, the following projects have floating slabs:

## Residential / House Projects
Project 25-01-084 - Project Name: Justin McKeen - 29' x 31' Floating Slab, Project Address: 20 Feeder Canal Road, City: Dunnville
This project features a floating slab design with thickened edges. The main slab area is 29' x 25' with an additional 11'-6" x 17'-6" section.
- Reinforcement: The slab is reinforced with (4) 15M rebar. Additional reinforcement options include 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh (WWM) or a 16" x 16" 10M grid.
- Thermal Break: A thermal break at the porch uses 12" long 15M rebar dowels at 16" on center with a 4" minimum embedment.
- Thickened Edge: The thickened edge detail (sections 2/S1 and 3/S1) includes a 2% slope grade away from the structure.
- Anchoring: The sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts at 48" on center, with openings at door locations.
- Insulation: A minimum of 2" (R10) of extruded polystyrene insulation with a 30 psi compressive strength is specified.
- Base: The foundation is built on compacted granular 'A' with an optional 6mil poly vapour barrier.
- Concrete: The concrete has a minimum compressive strength of 30 psi.

Project 25-01-073 - Project Name: Alexis Galvao 30' x 32' Floating Slab, Project Address: 6498 Quarry Point Road, City: Ramara
This project utilizes a floating slab foundation system measuring 32'-0" by 28'-0".
- Reinforcement: The slab is reinforced with (2) 15M rebar, each 2'-0" long. Options for general slab reinforcement include 6x6x½ WWM, a 16" x 16" 10M grid, or fiber mesh.
- Footings: The design includes 30" x 30" x 18" thick pad footings to support concentrated loads.
- Thickened Edge: The thickened edge section (2/S1) has a sill plate secured with ½"Ø anchor bolts at 48" on center, with openings for doors.
- Insulation: A minimum of 2" (R10) extruded polystyrene insulation with a compressive strength of 30 psi is used for thermal performance.
- Base: The foundation rests on a compacted granular 'A' base. An optional 6mil poly vapor barrier can be included.
- Drainage: The perimeter is designed with a 2% slope grade away from the structure.

Project 25-01-070 - Project Name: Gary Giles 26' x 30' Floating Slab, Project Address: 104 Sturgeon Glen Road, City: Kawartha Lakes
This project features a floating slab foundation measuring 30'-0" by 26'-0".
- Thickened Edge: The slab has a thickened edge detail (section callout '2/S1') reinforced with (4) 15M continuous rebar.
- Anchoring: A sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48" on center, with openings left at door locations.
- Reinforcement: Slab reinforcement options include 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh, a 16" x 16" 10M grid, or fiber mesh.
- Base: The slab is built on compacted granular 'A'. An optional 6 mil polyethylene vapor barrier is included to prevent moisture ingress.
- Drainage: A 2% slope grade away from the slab is specified for drainage.
- Insulation: Insulation is optional to enhance thermal performance.

Project 25-01-064 - Project Name: Paul Wiley 25' x 33' Garage, Project Address: 28 Tecumseh St, City: St. Catharines
This project's foundation is a floating slab with a footprint of 33'-0" by 25'-0", detailed in the 'PLAN FLOATING SLAB'.
- Thickened Edge: The 'SECTION THICKENED EDGE' (2/S1) shows the edge is reinforced with (4) 15M continuous rebar.
- Anchoring: A sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48" on center. Openings in the sill plate are required at door locations.
- Reinforcement: The slab is reinforced with 6x6x6 welded wire mesh or a 16" x 16" 10M grid. Fibre mesh is an alternative.
- Base: The foundation rests on compacted granular 'A' material. An optional 6 mil poly vapour barrier is included.
- Drainage: A 2% slope grade away from the slab is mandated for water runoff.

Project 25-01-028 - Project Name: Rob Lachapelle - 18' x 22' Garage Review, Project Address: 123 Dodson Street, City: Hamilton
This project uses a floating slab foundation system measuring 18'-0" by 22'-0", as shown in the 'PLAN FLOATING SLAB'.
- Thickened Edge: The thickened edge detail (section '2/S1') is reinforced with four 15M rebar.
- Anchoring: The sill plate is equipped with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts spaced at 48" on center.
- Insulation: The design includes a minimum of 2" of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi.
- Reinforcement: Slab reinforcement options are 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh, a 16" x 16" 10M grid, or fibre mesh.
- Base: The foundation is built on a compacted granular 'A' base. An optional 6mil poly vapour barrier is specified.
- Drainage: A 2% slope grade away from the foundation is required for drainage.

Project 25-01-019 - Project Name: Wayne Mckeown 24' x 35' Floating Slab, Project Address: 1182 Barton St, City: Hamilton
This project has a floating slab foundation with dimensions of 24' by 35'.
- Reinforcement: The slab is reinforced with (3) 15M rebar at the top and bottom of load-bearing edges, with additional (2) 15M hooked bars. Intermediate thickening sections are reinforced with continuous 15M rebar. General reinforcement is 6"x6"-6/6 welded wire mesh or a 10M grid at 10" on center.
- Anchoring: Hilti Kwik Bolt 3 Wedge Anchors with a minimum embedment of 4" are specified.
- Insulation: The foundation includes a minimum of 2" (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi.
- Base: The slab is built on compacted granular 'A' and includes a 6 mil poly layer as a vapor barrier.
- Drainage: The design specifies a 2% slope away from the structure for drainage.

Project 25-01-014 - Project Name: Conner Brydges 52' x 60' Floating Slab, Project Address: 2310 Line Road 6, Beckwith
This project features a large floating slab measuring 60' by 52'.
- Thickened Edge: The thickened edge detail (2/S1) is reinforced with four 15M rebar bars.
- Footing: An intermediate thickened strip footing (3/S1) is also used, reinforced with two continuous 15M rebar bars.
- Anchoring: The sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts at 48" on center.
- Reinforcement: Slab reinforcement options include 6x6x6 welded wire mesh (WWM), a 16" by 16" 10M grid, or fiber mesh.
- Insulation: A minimum of 2" (R10) of extruded polystyrene with a compressive strength of 30 psi is specified for both the slab edge and the strip footing.
- Base: The foundation is built on compacted granular 'A'. An optional 6 mil poly vapor barrier is included.
- Drainage: The thickened edge has a 2% slope grade away for drainage.

Project 25-01-002 - Project Name: Dwayne Goodyear 30' x 40' Floating Slab, Project Address: 17/184015 Bondiss Drive, Fort McMurray
This project's foundation is a 40' by 30' floating slab with a thickened edge.
- Thickened Edge: The detail (2/S1) includes an 8" poured concrete curb reinforced with 15M rebar (20" long) at 32" on center. The edge itself is reinforced with 15M rebar at 32" on center and a continuous 15M rebar at the top.
- Anchoring: The sill plate is secured with 1/2" diameter anchor bolts at 48" on center, with openings at door locations.
- Reinforcement: Slab reinforcement options are 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh, a 16" x 16" 10M grid, or fiber mesh.
- Insulation: A minimum of 2" (R10) of extruded polystyrene insulation with a compressive strength of 30 psi is specified.
- Base: The foundation is built on compacted granular 'A' with an optional 6-mil poly vapor barrier.
- Drainage: The grade is sloped away at 2% for drainage.
